attributes.action: Allow 16 to 18 year olds to have the vote.
attributes.additional_details: On the night of the Referendum a 17 year old made very clear his thoughts on television.  They were very sensible and very balanced and these young people should be respected and included
attributes.background:
The majority of 16 to 17 year old are leaving or have left school before the Referendum and therefore this vote affects them as well as the
18 years + age group.  It is time that we respect these young people's thoughts and votes
